name: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
desc: An object that specifies how user interface elements resize themselves when space is constrained.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a compression options object containing no options.

items.name: init(options: Set<NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions>)
items.desc: Creates an option object that represents the union of the supplied options.

items.name: init(identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates an option object with the given identifier string.

items.name: class var hideImages: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: An option specifying that views should hide their images.

items.name: class var hideText: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: An option specifying that views should hide their text.

items.name: class var reduceMetrics: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: An option specifying that views should reduce their internal metrics.

items.name: class var breakEqualWidths: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: An option specifying that views should no longer maintain equal width constraints.

items.name: class var standardOptions: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: An option that represents the union of all standard compression options.

items.name: var isEmpty: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that denotes whether the option is empty.

items.name: func contains(NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the supplied compression options are all present in the current instance.

items.name: func intersects(NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the supplied compression options intersect with the current instance's options.

items.name: func union(NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions) -> NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: Creates a new compression options object representing the union with the provided options.

items.name: func subtracting(NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions) -> NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: Creates a new compression options object with the supplied options removed.
